forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing after midnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with light rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with light rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers along with a few thunderstorms. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. Low 49F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. SE winds shifting to NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. SE winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.
